title: Towards a Windy Place
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Everyone, the day has finally come~! Is everyone prepared!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku! What are you saying? Of course, Yohane is fully prepared!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>We definitely need to perform the ritual this time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby didn’t believe that Yoshiko-chan’s ritual would really work at first.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I didn’t either. We shouldn’t underestimate the power of her rituals.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It’s so fun being able to wear dark robes together~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>This sacred ritual isn’t for fun! And also, it’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hey, hey. I’m just glad that everyone agreed to come and perform the ritual. Isn’t that right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I knew you’d understand the significance, Little Demon Riri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh, I got a message......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Who’s it from?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s from Nijigaku! They sent a message saying that they’ve also been working hard to prepare for their own concert~ Ehehe, I’m happy to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s reassuring to hear...... Alright, everyone. Let’s do this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch1003/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
